pkgmetadata.longdescription: IPython Vega============IPython/Jupyter notebook module for `Vega <https://github.com/vega/vega/>`_and `Vega-Lite <https://github.com/vega/vega-lite/>`_.Notebooks with embedded visualizations can be viewed on GitHub and nbviewer.For more information, see https://github.com/vega/ipyvega.Installation Notes------------------When installing from PyPI, extra steps may be required to enable the Jupyternotebook extension. For more information, see the`github page <https://github.com/vega/ipyvega>`_.
